long_description: Don't let mud puddles and snow patches keep you from enjoying your backpacking trip. The water-resistant REI Mountain gaiters water and debris out of your boots when you're on the trail. Tough 420-denier polyester fabric has Durable Water Repellent and polyurethane coatings to help shed moisture when you're stepping in puddles or hiking in the rain. 500-denier durable nylon scuff guards protect high-wear areas from abrasion. Heavy-duty 1.5 in. rip-and-stick front closures provide a secure and adjustable fit. Shockcord and hooks at the bottoms ensure a snug fit around many types of footwear; shockcords at the tops secure the gaiters around your calves. Rugged Hypalon(R) instep straps wrap underneath your shoes; buckle allows strap length adjustment.
short_description: Don't let mud puddles and snow patches keep you from enjoying your backpacking trip. The water-resistant REI Mountain gaiters water and debris out of your boots when you're on the trail.
